headline.main: NEW GROUP HERE ASKS DECLARATION OF WAR; Resolution Calls Full Action Vital to Defeat Hitler

lead_paragraph: Members of the New York City League for a Declared War held their first meeting last week at the Hotel Commodore and unanimously adopted a resolution demanding an immediate declaration against Germany.
abstract: leagues N Y group urges Cong action
snippet: Members of the New York City League for a Declared War held their first meeting last week at the Hotel Commodore and unanimously adopted a resolution demanding an immediate declaration against Germany....
